oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rosemary Clooney in Nashville, 1953 February
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Celebrity entertainer Rosemary Clooney, as she appeared at the WSM Sunday Down South Show, and the Grand Ole Opry at Ryman Auditorium. The performance date was in February, 1953. She also met Mayor and Mrs. Ben West at the Richland Club. A year after her appearance in Nashville, she starred, along with Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, and Vera-Ellen, in the movie “White Christmas.” Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 10 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Clooney, Rosemary; West, Ben, 1911-1974
Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.)
